structure.unit: Excise On Deeds, Instruments And Writings

law.catch_line: Reimbursement By State Of Counties For Bond Premiums
law.text: If a register of deeds through his county treasurer has paid the premium for a surety company bond required in connection with the obtaining, keeping and selling of such stamps, the commissioner, on proof of such payment, shall certify to the comptroller the amount so paid, and the state treasurer shall reimburse the county therefor.
